QuestData.Title: At Your Command
QuestData.Description: Commander, the outpost is nearly fully operational.$b$bGazlowe provided us with two different blueprints to fill this final plot - an Arsenal or an Arcane Sanctum.$B$BEither one would provide us with the additional firepower we need to stop the Iron Horde's advance.$B$BThe plans are on the drafting table. It's your call.
QuestData.LogDescription: Inspect the Drafting Table and choose which outpost structure to construct.
QuestData.RewardText: Your will be done.$B$BFor the Horde!
